meanings.definition: A tropical tree native to Brazil, known for its red dye.
meanings.sent1: The brazilwood tree grows tall in the warm Brazilian forests.
meanings.sent2: The red dye extracted from brazilwood is used to color fabrics.
meanings.sent3: Why did the toucan bring brazilwood to the party? To dye for!
meanings.sent4: Her cheeks flushed as red as brazilwood when she was embarrassed.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant red of brazilwood dye is as striking as a sunset.

meanings.definition: The hard, heavy, and durable wood of the brazilwood tree.
meanings.sent1: Craftsmen carved intricate designs into the brazilwood to make furniture.
meanings.sent2: The brazilwood is prized for its strength and resistance to decay.
meanings.sent3: Why did the termite refuse to eat the brazilwood? It was too tough to chew!
meanings.sent4: His resolve was as solid as brazilwood, unwavering in the face of challenges.
meanings.sent5: The sound of an axe striking brazilwood echoed through the forest.
